pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Large Carnivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() False $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Aggressive $(br)$(l)Type:$() Apex $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Grasslands
The Acrocanthosaurus is a large-sized, swift carnivore. Upon hitting 33% health or less, it'll go into a panic mode and gain Speed and Strength.
